# error

**Instance Property**

The connection-wide error property.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

Indicates any fatal error that occurred while processing the connection or performing data reading or writing. Use Key-Value Observing to watch this property.

## Monitoring the connection status

- **state**: The status of the connection.
- **NWTCPConnectionState**: Defined connection states. New types may be defined in the future.
- **isViable**: The viability of a TCP connection indicates whether or not data can be transferred.
